item.title: 摩根大通支持美联储大幅减息。但对下一步行动不太确定
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）是周三正确预测美联储降息半点的华尔街巨头之一。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co., the one Wall Street titan to correctly call the Federal Reserve’s half-point interest-rate cut on Wednesday, says another big reduction hinges on the US labor market getting weaker.】

item.title: 因猜测 MBK 将提高报价，韩国锌业股价大涨
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）股价跃升至创纪录水平，原因是市场猜测私募股权公司 MBK Partners 将提高收购报价，以获得这家全球最大金属精炼商的控制权。【原文：Korea Zinc Co. shares jumped to a record on speculation private equity firm MBK Partners will raise its offer to gain control of the world’s biggest refiner of the metal.】

item.title: 印尼意外降息后，经济学家押注印尼将采取更多宽松政策
item.description: 印尼银行本周先于美联储降息，令市场大吃一惊，预计印尼银行今年将继续降低借贷成本，但降息速度将慢于美国。【原文：Bank Indonesia, which surprised markets this week by cutting interest rates ahead of the Federal Reserve, is expected to keep lowering borrowing costs this year, but at a slower pace than in the US.】

item.title: 苹果面临欧盟开放 iPhone 操作系统的警告
item.description: 苹果公司将受到欧盟的警告，要求其向竞争对手的技术开放其严加防范的 iPhone 操作系统，否则最终将面临巨额罚款。【原文：Apple Inc. is set to be warned by the European Union to open up its highly guarded iPhone operating system to rival technologies, or eventually risk significant fines.】

item.title: 国际能源署称计划终止经乌克兰输送俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，它正计划在今年年底过境协议到期后停止俄罗斯天然气流经乌克兰，并警告说基辅及其邻国将面临一个艰难的冬天。【原文：The International Energy Agency said it’s planning for an end to Russian gas flows through Ukraine after a transit deal expires at the end of the year, warning of a tough winter ahead for Kyiv and its neighbors.】

item.title: 捷克政府计划因洪灾增加预算赤字
item.description: 捷克财政部长兹比内克-斯坦尤拉（Zbynek Stanjura）表示，捷克政府将增加今明两年的财政赤字，以弥补近期大范围洪灾造成的部分损失。【原文：The Czech government will increase fiscal deficits planned for this year and next to cover part of the damage caused by recent widespread floods, according to Finance Minister Zbynek Stanjura.】

item.title: 十年来最大规模外资买入后，巴基斯坦股市创下历史新高
item.description: 由于强劲的外资流入和宏观经济指标的改善提振了市场情绪，巴基斯坦股市在周四的交易中创下历史新高。【原文：Stocks in Pakistan rose to a record high during trading on Thursday as robust foreign inflows and improving macro-economic indicators boost sentiment.】

item.title: 菲亚特克莱斯勒中国工厂拍卖第三次失败
item.description: 菲亚特-克莱斯勒破产的中国合资企业的管理人在拍卖会上第三次未能售出位于中国南方的一家合资汽车厂，尽管价格下降了三分之一以上，这表明全球最大的汽车市场对内燃机的需求不足。【原文：The administrator for Fiat Chrysler’s bankrupt Chinese venture failed to sell a jointly run auto factory in Southern China for a third time at auction, despite slashing the price by more than a third, indicating the lack of demand for internal combustion engines in the world’s largest car market.】

item.title: Vonovia 交易为埃利奥特的 Deutsche Wohnen 赌注提供了出路
item.description: 在激进股东埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management LP）长达数年的活动之后，德国住宅业主 Vonovia SE 表示准备向子公司的小股东提供优惠条件，以换取更严格的控制权。【原文：German residential landlord Vonovia SE said it’s prepared to offer sweeteners to minority shareholders of a subsidiary in exchange for tighter control, following a yearslong campaign by activist shareholder Elliott Investment Management LP.】

item.title: 欧洲央行对市场的降息预期感到满意
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，他对投资者押注进一步降息感到放心。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot said he’s comfortable with investor bets on further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 首席执行官辞职后，金巴利的顶级投资者买入股票，推动集团发展
item.description: Davide Campari-Milano NV 的控股股东表示，将购买高达 1 亿欧元（1.11 亿美元）的股票，在其首席执行官突然辞职一天后，这将对这家意大利烈酒制造商起到提振作用。【原文：The controlling shareholder of Davide Campari-Milano NV said it will buy up to €100 million ($111 million) of shares in a boost for the Italian spirits maker a day after its chief executive officer abruptly quit.】

item.title: 新业务激增，发现公司利润攀升；计划分红
item.description: 发现保险公司（Discovery Ltd.）表示，由于新业务激增以及南非新成立的银行部门亏损减少，南非最大的保险公司全年利润增长了 12%。【原文：Discovery Ltd. said a surge in new business and smaller losses at its fledgling banking unit in South Africa boosted full-year profit for the nation’s biggest insurer by 12%.】

item.title: 挪威保持利率稳定，并发出 2025 年首次降息的信号
item.description: 挪威央行坚持世界上最鹰派的货币政策立场之一，使投资者对其最快将于今年首次下调借贷成本的希望破灭。【原文：Norway’s central bank is sticking with one of the rich world’s most hawkish monetary policy stances, dashing investor hopes that it would advance plans for a first cut in borrowing costs as soon as this year.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫在俄罗斯封锁的 YouTube 上向全球宣传普京
item.description: 克里姆林宫正在转向 Alphabet 公司旗下的 YouTube，以向全世界传播其信息，即使它正在限制普通俄罗斯人访问美国社交媒体网站。【原文：The Kremlin is turning to Alphabet Inc.’s YouTube to get its message out to the world even as it’s throttling access for ordinary Russians to the US social media site.】

item.description:
公司债券和贷款能否继续无视地心引力？【原文：

Will corporate bonds and loans continue to defy gravity?

item.title: 拉扎德效仿高盛在沙特阿拉伯设立中东总部
item.description: 在较大的竞争对手高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）获得类似许可几个月后，拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：Lazard Inc. became the latest Wall Street firm to comply with Saudi Arabia’s ultimatum for foreign firms to set up their Middle Eastern base in the kingdom, months after larger rival Goldman Sachs Group Inc. secured a similar license.】

item.title: 印度电信股暴跌，因为最高法院驳回了关于会费的请求
item.description: 印度最高法院驳回了这些公司要求重新计算过去拖欠政府的约 130 亿美元债务的请求，印度无线运营商的股票周四大幅下跌。【原文：Shares of Indian wireless carriers plunged on Thursday after the country’s top court rejected the firms’ request to re-calculate about $13 billion of past dues that they owe to the government.】

item.title: 瑞士钟表业在出口增长的同时仍发出疲软警告
item.description: 瑞士制表商警告说，尽管上个月因贵金属制成的昂贵钟表需求旺盛而导致出口增长，但该行业的前景仍在恶化。【原文：Swiss watchmakers warned of a worsening outlook for the industry, even as exports rose last month on demand for expensive timepieces made of precious metals.】

item.title: 丹麦托普索公司首席执行官希望推迟首次公开募股，暂时保持私有化
item.description: Topsoe A/S 的首席执行官计划暂时搁置首次公开募股，并在这家丹麦工程公司上市前集中精力改进关键部门，该公司上个月下调了收入预期。【原文：Topsoe A/S’s chief executive officer plans to hold off on an initial public offering for now, and focus on improving key units before listing the Danish engineering company, which last month cut its revenue forecast.】

item.title: 欧洲 9 月柴油进口量有望创 17 个月新高
item.description: 进入欧盟和英国的柴油货运量将在 9 月份攀升至约 1 年半以来的最高水平，来自中东的货运量反弹有助于抵消美国货运量的小幅下滑。【原文：Diesel cargoes into the European Union and the UK are poised to climb in September to the highest in about 1 1/2 years, with a rebound in shipments from the Middle East helping to offset a small dip in US flows.】

item.title: 什么是循环经济？
item.description: 获取、制造、使用、处置。几十年来，这一直是生产和消费的标准方法。公司获取原材料并将其转化为产品，然后由消费者购买，消费者最终将其丢弃，产生的废物最终被填埋到垃圾填埋场和海洋中。担心气候变化和环境退化的人们正在挑战这种线性模式的可持续性，并呼吁建立一种所谓的循环经济，即获取、制造、使用、再利用和再重复使用。【原文：Take, make, use, dispose. For decades, this has been the standard approach to production and consumption. Companies take raw materials and transform them into products, which are purchased by consumers, who ultimately toss them out, creating waste that ends up in landfills and oceans. People who are worried about climate change and environmental degradation are challenging the sustainability of this linear model and urging a so-called circular economy of take, make, use, reuse and reuse again an】

item.title: 森特诺告诉《政治家》：欧洲央行可能不得不加快降息步伐
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）告诉 Politico，欧洲中央银行可能不得不加快降息步伐，以避免通胀率低于预期。【原文：The European Central Bank may have to quicken the pace that it lowers interest rates to avoid inflation falling short of forecasts, Governing Council member Mario Centeno told Politico.】

item.title: BancTrust 称美联储降息可能刺激尼日利亚和安哥拉的欧洲债券销售
item.description: BancTrust & Co.称，美联储降息半个百分点可能会为尼日利亚和安哥拉等非洲国家发行新债铺平道路。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s half-percentage-point interest-rate cut may pave the way for new debt issuance by African nations including Nigeria and Angola, according to BancTrust & Co.】

item.title: 报告称国泰航空发动机起火可能导致重大损失
item.description: 一份初步报告称，本月早些时候国泰航空公司一架航班的发动机在空中起火，火势可能蔓延并对飞机造成大面积损坏。【原文：A midair engine fire on a Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. flight earlier this month could have spread and caused widespread damage to the plane, a preliminary report said, as investigations continue into the incident and the failed components.】

item.title: 美联储降息，亚洲货币创 14 个月新高
item.description: 在美联储启动宽松政策并表示今年将进一步缩减后，亚洲货币升至一年多来最强劲的水平。【原文：Asian currencies advanced to the strongest level in more than a year after the Federal Reserve kicked off policy easing and signaled further reductions this year.】

item.title: Ocado 零售店在本季度业绩大增后上调了销售额预期
item.description: 英国中产阶级最喜爱的零售商 Ocado Group Plc 的在线杂货业务在第三季度表现强劲后，提高了今年的收入指导。【原文：Ocado Group Plc’s online grocery business lifted its revenue guidance for the year after a strong third quarter for the retailer, a favorite of England’s middle classes.】

item.title: 美联储利率中枢有望推动亚洲资产大幅上涨
item.description: 美联储转向降息对亚洲资产来说是个好兆头，因为许多亚洲资产被低估，与全球同类资产相比，亚洲资产的盈利前景更好，从宽松政策中获益的空间更大。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s shift to interest-rate cuts bodes well for Asian assets as many are underowned, and have better earnings prospects and more room to benefit from easing than their global peers.】

item.title: 男孩被刺身亡后，日本公司提醒在华员工注意安全
item.description: 一名日本小男孩在中国大陆被刺身亡后，日本一些最大的公司敦促保护在中国的员工。【原文：Some of Japan’s biggest companies urged the protection of employees in China, following the fatal stabbing in the mainland of a young Japanese boy.】

item.title: 区块链公司Blockdaemon权衡2026年上市可能性
item.description: 区块链基础设施提供商Blockdaemon公司创始人康斯坦丁-里希特（Konstantin Richter）表示，该公司可能会在2026年进行首次公开募股。【原文：Blockchain infrastructure provider Blockdaemon Inc. may pursue an initial public offering in 2026, its founder Konstantin Richter said.】

item.title: 南非央行四年来首次降息，兰特上涨
item.description: 周四上午，兰特在南非储备银行利率决议公布前上涨，预计该央行将自2020年7月以来首次降息。【原文：The rand gained Thursday morning ahead of a South African Reserve Bank interest rate decision, where the central bank is expected to deliver its first cut since July 2020.】
